translations: v．过度管理，微管理：指管理者过分关注细节，过度干预下属的工作，导致效率降低。
· The boss micromanages every aspect of the project.
老板过度管理项目的每一个方面。

sentences.sentence: Just because your boss is a jerk and you don't like the way he micromanages you doesn't mean you shouldn't be a sponge when it comes to learning everything you can from him.
sentences.translation: 只是因为你的老板是个混蛋并且你不喜欢他给你穿小鞋，并不意味着你不该向他学习一切可以学到的东西。
